title: Love Is In The Hallways
description: Luke is still on cloud nine after what happened in the park with Cameron. He has a boyfriend and is in shock. At the same time he is completely and utterly head over heels in love.Cameron wants to announce the two of them as a couple at school. He is adamant that together Luke and Cam can make changes in the way being gay is perceived at school.Luke knows just what real life can be like. His heart wants to believe that Cameron is right but his head tells him differently.When everyone starts to accuse Luke of changing Cameron he wonders if he can ever be happy in a relationship. Not just at school.
author: R.J. Scott
